storyInfo: Rhodes Island receives word of Outcast's sacrifice and formally prepares to advance toward Londinium.

attributes.content: Leave it to me... You've traveled far to bring her home.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: I will take care of the rest personally.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Ashes... and her personal effects.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There hasn't been an emergency transmission to Rhodes Island's deck for eleven months and twenty-seven days, since the end of the Chernobog incident.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: —Who's the victim?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Outcast.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Right. I see you holding her revolver's cylinder.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I don't want to admit it, but I already knew the answer. I figured it out on our way here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I made a bet with her once—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And it looks like she won.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, I won't be at that next meeting.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Per protocol, you're in charge of an elite operator's funeral...
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: But I want to be the one to send her off this time.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: I doubt anyone will object. Definitely not her.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Since the meeting's canceled, I'll give you my final decision right now—
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: I know what you're going to say.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Then I'm sure you know what everyone else will say.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: The situation has changed. No one's happy about it, but we all know this is the only choice we have.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: —We have to enter Londinium as soon as we can.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: I'm sure you know that my position has always been the same—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But regardless of whether the rest of you support my decision or not, I must emphasize that Rhodes Island's direction will not be set on the airing of personal feelings.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You're telling me to forget about avenging Outcast?
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Don't worry. I'm angry and hurt, but I know my job.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: It's just... I need to see for myself what it was that killed Outcast—
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: It couldn't have been just one person, or even several of them.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Suppose we don't go looking for the truth. The darkness shrouding Londinium, and even all of Victoria, is only going to get worse.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: And at that point, it won't just be Outcast...
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: I'll die. We all will. No one will be safe.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Just like you said, Rhodes Island isn't about avenging the dead...
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: But I am sure we all want to let the living live.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Er... Where am I now? Did I make another wrong turn?
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Oh, whoops! It's almost time. I have to hurry... *sigh*, Uncle Oliver never told me how big this ship was!
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Huh? Are you...?!
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Wait, please! Hold on!
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Mm...
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: (Why doesn't she seem to know me at all?)
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: (No, it couldn't be anyone else.)
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: (I've been meaning to find out what happened to her ever since I came to the ship, but they either didn't know or wouldn't tell me.)
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: (Hmm... Maybe it's for the best, for her own safety?)
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Hello.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: A—Are you reading? 'The Legend of Ivanhoe'... I've read it too. It's one of my favorites.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Don't you think this part of Victorian history makes for a really fun read?
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Is it... fun? I suppose... but it's not real.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: It's a novel... That's all.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: Right... I suppose that is true. Do you want to read something else, too? I have lots of books... Oh. No, sorry. It slipped my mind I didn't bring any of them with me...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: If you like this one... you can have it.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: Huh? Are you sure? Th-Thanks...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: I'll be... going now.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: Oh, okay! Bye!
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: (Will we see each other again?)
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: (She has another book on her... A poetry collection?)
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Seamus Williams... The name rings a bell, and I think I've seen that cover before.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: This must be the place...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: I—Identification code? What is that? Is it in the 'New Operator Guide?'
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Ugh, I don't want to be late. I'll just knock.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Come in!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Good afternoon, Miss Willow... or should I call you Operator Saileach?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh... Miss Amiya!
attributes.name: Saileach

attributes.content: Please, just Amiya. That's what everyone calls me here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm sorry about this, Amiya... You're so busy, I shouldn't have you cut into your work to come see me. When I did my physical the other day, I heard you only got about five hours off a day...
attributes.name: Saileach

attributes.content: Folinic's always so worried about my health. Don't worry, though. I'm in excellent shape, and I've actually wanted to see you again for some time.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So this used to be Outcast's office...?
attributes.name: Saileach

attributes.content: Yes, but she didn't get a lot of use out of it. We only just convinced her to accept a title change two months before the incident.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She told me she was essentially half-retired before she came to County Hillock...
attributes.name: Saileach

attributes.content: But she still insisted on taking the mission.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I often think back to everything she told me in those few days... I think she had probably made up her mind, already, to take on everything.
attributes.name: Saileach

attributes.content: That's just like her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All our elite operators are pretty eccentric, but Outcast's particularly special—She makes the kinds of difficult decisions that others would have a hard time with.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Right, she told me... she gave up a really high position in the church because she failed to mediate peace in a war.
attributes.name: Saileach

attributes.content: Hmm... I know she left the church, but a failed mediation?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't remember seeing that in her file. Actually, that sounds more like something that happened to Misery.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ha... haha... I don't know why, but taking someone else's story sounds like something she'd do.
attributes.name: Saileach

attributes.content: This may be why some people found Outcast a little insincere...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No, even if you tell me not everything she said was the truth, she's still the most sincere person I've ever met.
attributes.name: Saileach

attributes.content: You really think so? Hmm... I'm not too surprised. Outcast's always had an eye for people.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I know your time is precious... but would you mind telling me more about her?
attributes.name: Saileach

attributes.content: I don't mind at all.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This is going to take some time, though—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: As long as you have time. I'll always be willing to listen.
attributes.name: Saileach

attributes.content: Okay. I think... we'll have lots of time on our way to Londinium.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Several months later...
Are you done fixing that yet?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh, keep your head on. What's the rush? This town's so far from anywhere, it's tough to find a replacement circuit for our comms...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Let me do it. Any equipment you touch always goes up in smoke. That's never changed.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I mean, it's been forever since the last time this safe house was used...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I should never have listened to you and taken this route.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: We've been drifting all over the place for the last few months, and we spent half that time in the middle of nowhere, eating sand!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It's only been a few years... How come my Chenchen's so much angrier in the eyes there?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Stop mumbling... I can hear every word. You've got the loudest whisper.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What's the rush, she says? Why aren't you in a rush?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You know how long we've been out here? Forget the spectre force. We haven't found anything that even resembles a clue!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: If I ran into a situation like this back when I was a cop in Lungmen, I would have told you to give up... No hostage would last this long.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I know the captain's still alive.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: And likewise, she knows I'm doin' everythin' I can to save her, and I know she's lookin' for a way to regroup with me.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Eh, fine, whatever. There's no helping you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: If I could talk you out of anything, you wouldn't have been dragging me all over the place.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Just goes to show how sweet you are on me, Chenchen!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Enough, I understand persistence. All those years, back when I had my heart set on finding her, you always supported me... Anyway, let's not talk about this right now.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: —The point is, you heard it yourself.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The County Hillock Incident's a military drill gone wrong. That's what they told the public.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Everyone who's hurt or sick will receive compensation and be resettled. According to government documents, anyway.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: If Dublinn, or the spectre force, had taken over County Hillock when you left, then they've long since left the place without a trace.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's not going to change, even if we go back to see it for ourselves.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I agree.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: But I still remember everythin' I saw there. No matter how peaceful their things might seem, County Hillock... and the cities around it have gone through a great change.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Besides... isn't it all the more scary, when you think about how those changes are so well hidden in plain sight?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: If the enemy chose to lay low after they made such a huge ruckus, that just says they're brewin' an even bigger scheme!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Victoria... might be lookin' at a crisis way bigger than the Hillock situation.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I believe you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's why I'm here.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But I'm not sure there are many more out there who do.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's why we need to work harder!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Then I guess we need to figure a way into the big cities.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Do you remember Hughes?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The, um... the round one who tripped and bumped his head just about anywhere in trainin'?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: He's the vice-chairman of Tradersmill City's Business Alliance.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: If any of our classmates caught wind of anything on the down low, it's him.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Actually, before you even brought it up, I'd been thinkin' of askin' Hughes to help... No, not just Hughes. I wanted to try Big Green, Ginger Bill... and all the rest!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I've tried findin' them myself... It was plenty tough, though...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: But now I've got you here, plus the supplies and intel support that Rhodes Island so generously provides—
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: So I'm pumped up on hope!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Let me warn you first. I have no idea how easily they'll be convinced—Huh?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Bloody son of a... Why'd you yank me that hard?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Chenchen, the transmitter's on!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: An emergency message from Rhodes Island...?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: They got our location before the transmitter broke, right? Could they have been trying to reach me...?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What's the matter? You look like that message socked you straight in the gut...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Oh, I think I get it... Is it about her?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Sure enough...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I need some time to think about what's to come.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Jessica, how's the mission going?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I'm on the road already.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Don't let your guard down.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Relax, Liskarm... I may not have been back to Victoria much, but we have entry permissions for our aircraft. The navigation system is working fine, too.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Our mission to escort the expats back to Columbia isn't difficult in itself, but the situation could change at any moment.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I was actually pretty surprised when we got their message, though...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: The journey's been pretty much smooth sailing so far, but... have things really gotten so bad?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Phew... Sorry, I couldn't really show it when the captain and the rest of the team was there, but I'm actually rather nervous about this.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Your captain's not there...?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Oh, no. She left with a few others not long after we'd got to Victoria.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I guess... they might have another mission?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: There's obviously a reason that the expat evacuation was assigned to the Department of Equipment and Applied Technologies.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I-Is there an obvious reason?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: It's not necessarily a bad thing that you haven't noticed.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Do you mean... they are still having discussions with others?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: But the Victorian government hasn't given us any orders...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Per the confidentiality agreement, I shouldn't be speculating or commenting on the other departments' information.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Forget what I said.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Focus on your mission, and let me know if anything comes up.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Remember, although this mission is Blacksteel's, our agreement with Rhodes Island still stands.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Alright! I got it!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Once Rhodes Island's squads make it to the outskirts of Londinium, I will rendezvous with them, as needed.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: We're getting close...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.options: Vina, are you nervous?;......;We've waited so long for this day.

attributes.content: A few months ago, Dr. Kal'tsit asked me if I was ready.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: And I told her, I didn't know.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: And I still don't know, even now.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: So, I can't say for sure that I'm not nervous.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Doctor, thank you for staying with me.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: If I'm still here seeking the quiet by your side... does that make it seem like I'm hiding from my problems?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Ever since the day I escaped, yeah, I've been waiting for the chance to return.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I can't help but wonder... If someone's gone for too long from where they belonged before, do they still really have a place to go home?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.options: When I woke up, I didn't even know how long it'd been since I left.;Amiya and everyone welcomed me.

attributes.content: I heard about those days.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You'd just awakened, and right away you had to take command and go through everything that happened at Chernobog... Most people couldn't have handled things as well as you did.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Amiya... Doctor, you're family to her.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Rhodes Island needs you. All of us operators need you as well. There's no doubt about it.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.options: I'm sure someone is waiting for you in Londinium too.

attributes.content: The Glasgow Gang must have a new leader by now. They could never have set roots down in Londinium without one.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: As for the others...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I doubt my absence has left Londinium wanting.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.options: If you want the answer, we must keep going.

attributes.content: You told me before... you wanted to go to Londinium to find the truth.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Are we all bound for there together?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: It really does lighten me up, knowing I won't take this journey alone.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I hope the answer that lies ahead won't be one too ugly.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But whatever it is, I will do my best to shape it into something half decent with my hammer.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Have they arrived?
attributes.name: Regent

attributes.content: Soon, Your Majesty. The Nachzehrer King and the Vampires' Prince of Blood will arrive in Londinium in three days.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: With the court reassembled, the Sarkaz have not been so close to reunification since before the civil war.
attributes.name: Regent

attributes.content: We mustn't let any other factions get in the way.
attributes.name: Regent

attributes.content: Speaking of other factions, Your Majesty, the envoy from County Hillock is still in Londinium.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: We've already reached a conclusion on that.
attributes.name: Regent

attributes.content: It's just as you said, Your Majesty. They don't truly wish to form an alliance.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Had they such a motive, they wouldn't send a lunatic of a servant in their place as they hide whole behind the curtain.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: There is no chance she lays hands on what she wants, but that is not why she left. The force she brought with her has been involved in multiple skirmishes with noble remnants and local residents in Londinium's outskirts.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: They're probing the situation in Londinium, as well as evaluating our strength.
attributes.name: Regent

attributes.content: Yes, Your Majesty. If we appear weak, the powers behind her will step onto the stage sooner.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Yet if we take a strong approach, she will lose her value as a pawn, and face a hasty disposal.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: All those who would wield the blade that is the Sarkaz will find themselves slain by that very blade.
attributes.name: Regent

attributes.content: She is not even in the same class as Talulah.
attributes.name: Regent

attributes.content: They may come from similar bloodlines, but Dublinn's leader and Talulah are nothing alike.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Compared to Reunion, the troubles that Dublinn stirs in the south have more than proven their strength. And it proves they are either ready to or are preparing to rip Victoria apart.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: If one seeks to kick a man when he's down, one will only appear at the climax of the chaos.
attributes.name: Regent

attributes.content: At this stage, so long as the objective before us has nothing to do with the Sarkaz, no matter what they are scheming outside, they are unworthy of my attention.
attributes.name: Regent

attributes.content: But I will not allow any more chaos in Londinium.
attributes.name: Regent

attributes.content: Have Manfred do something about this. Dealing with the nobles is far too simple a task for him. He needs growth, and he needs it fast.
attributes.name: Regent

attributes.content: Manfred has always known how you feel. He's made the preparations.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Still not enough. Any movement from Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Regent

attributes.content: For the past few months, their usual, so-called 'commercial activities' have proceeded apace.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Ever since their landship sailed off from Kazimierz late last year, they've come close to Victoria several times. Since then, they've scarcely left our watchful eyes, and never for long.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: As soon as they near Londinium... No, as soon as the few of them enter Victoria, report to me at once.
attributes.name: Regent

attributes.content: Or perhaps you may report to her directly.
attributes.name: Regent

attributes.content: Of course, Your Majesty—The King of Sarkaz knows how to reclaim her promised crown.
attributes.name: Confessarius
